body: <flux:content.get area="$1"${3: limit="$2"}${5: offset="$4"}${7: order="'${6:sorting}'"}${9: sortDirection="'${8:ASC}'"}${11: as="$10"}${13: loadRegister="$12"}${15: render="${14:1}"}>
<flux:content.render area="$1"${3: limit="$2"}${5: offset="$4"}${7: order="'${6:sorting}'"}${9: sortDirection="'${8:ASC}'"}${11: as="$10"}${13: loadRegister="$12"}${15: render="${14:1}"}>
